DataElement.preferredName: Loss Communication Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the loss of communication neurologic function scale domain.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Loss Communication Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A gradual decline in amount or activity._the exchange of information between objects, people, or groups._A specific area of neurological interest within the Raymond neurologic function scale, subdivided into 3 or 4 levels of function with scores based on discrete quantifiable measures._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
